thread.title: Joshua a green
thread.title_full: eDreams evaluado por Joshua a green

author: Joshua a green
title: Joshua a green
text: I had to be put in the hospital 20 days before my flight called to cancel as soon as getting out, because doctor said absolutely no flying. this company said they would give me 42.00 dollars back after there charge for cancelling I would receive 2.00 dollars back. my family and I will never use this company again, unless they can make this right. BOOKING NUMBER IS 2547369265
